channel.title: Drug of choice
channel.description:
Since MITB has become the huge fan base of drugs, I'd like to ask whats your favorite?
I love opiates, anything opium related. <3 It. :D
gogogo

item.title: Drug of choice
item.dc:creator: @wayzey wayzey
item.description:
@wayzey wrote:

[quote=“twins, post:63, topic:261194”]http://www.drugfreeworld.org/

Drugs harm you![/quote]

Gotta love that anti-drug Propaganda, God Bless America xD

Anyway, Weed is best for sure, LSD is fucking insane in good and bad ways especially when you’re mates with a bunch of assholes xD
I’ve done party pills a few times when I lived in NZ, i’m not sure what they are exactly, they were pretty fuckin wierd, let’s just put it at that.

Ain’t done anything stronger and probably never will.

item.title: Drug of choice
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

i really dont think they wouldnt bond together to make the poisionous and radioactive thing he was looking for.

uranium is a transition metal so the cynaide would probably be its ligands, while the poisionous cynaide stuff is generally bonded ionically (NaCN, KCN etc etc) with the notable exception of HCN.

ok i admit uranium cyanide could exist…

Read full topic

item.title: Drug of choice
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

[quote=“Rictoo, post:66, topic:261194”][quote author=Uriko link=topic=344926.msg2751527#msg2751527 date=1239934389]

Drugs can be interesting and could be used for a experience in life, but i don’t want to make a natural habit in taking anything dangerous, but i don’t think weed should really be classed as a drug as allot of people do it.
[/quote]wtf, that was fucking retarded.
“i don’t thing drinking and driving should be illegal because a lot of people do it”

i don’t think rape should be illegal because a lot of people do it[/quote]
Rape hurt other, because of that its illegal.
Using drugs harm only you for most of the time then it should be as legal as Cigarettes and more legal than Alcohol.

plus 2 pills aint that much to get high from, u would just feel more energetic from that

try beat 20 sharks mate.
